name: selectLast
description: Selects the last (most recent) value from a sorted collection or group. Typically used with groupBy() to get the final value after sorting by timestamp or another field.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field name to select the last value from

parameters.name: as
parameters.description: Alias name for the output field

notes: Commonly used to find the latest configuration, timestamp, or state value within grouped events. Often paired with sort() or used after temporal grouping.
